solution_line_template: Bush is younger than Matt by {bush_younger_by} years, so if Bush is {bush_age} years old then Matt is {bush_age}+{bush_younger_by} = <<{bush_age}+{bush_younger_by}={matt_age}>>{matt_age} years old
In {years_in_future} years' time, Matt will be {years_in_future}+{matt_age} = <<{years_in_future}+{matt_age}={matt_age_in_10_years}>>{matt_age_in_10_years} years old
